title: Andrew Cooper
text:
Banff, Calgary




Welcome to my website! Here you can find information about some of the work I’ve completed so far in my Statistics career (and some other fun stuff).
I’m a 5th-year PhD candidate in Statistics at Virginia Polytechnic and State University. Before that I received my Bachelors (’18) and Masters (’20) degrees in Statistics from Duke University. If I’m not doing research, I’m probably playing saxophone or going on a hike.
